info.name: WSP Backend API - Complete Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for WSP Backend covering all endpoints: Authentication, Users, POS, Clients, Service Plans, Subscriptions, Invoices, Payments, Static IP, PPPoE Requests, Suspension History, Audit Logs, and Bandwidth Pool management.

item.name: 01. Authentication
item.description: Authentication endpoints for login, logout, and token refresh

request.description: Authenticate user and receive access token. Store token in environment variable for subsequent requests.
Logout current user and invalidate session
Refresh access token (if refresh token mechanism is implemented)

item.name: 02. Users Management
item.description: User management endpoints - Create, read, update, activate/deactivate users. Requires WSP_ADMIN or SUB_ADMIN role with appropriate capabilities.

request.description: Create a new user. For SUB_ADMIN role, capabilities array is required.
Create a SUB_ADMIN user with specific capabilities. SUB_ADMIN must have at least one capability.
Get all users. Requires USERS_READ capability.
Get a specific user by ID. Requires USERS_READ capability.
Update user information. Requires USERS_UPDATE capability.
Activate a user account. Requires USERS_ACTIVATE capability.
Deactivate a user account. Requires USERS_DEACTIVATE capability.

item.name: 03. POS Management
item.description: Point of Sale (POS) location management - Create, read, update, activate/deactivate POS locations, manage bandwidth, and assign managers.

request.description: Create a new POS location. Requires POS_CREATE capability. Allocated bandwidth must not exceed available bandwidth pool.
Get all POS locations. Requires POS_READ capability.
Get a specific POS location by ID. Requires POS_READ capability.
Update POS location information. Requires POS_UPDATE capability.
Activate a POS location. Requires POS_UPDATE capability.
Deactivate a POS location. Requires POS_UPDATE capability.
Update allocated bandwidth for a POS location. Requires POS_UPDATE capability. Total allocated bandwidth across all POS must not exceed bandwidth pool.
Get all clients associated with a POS location. Requires POS_READ capability.
Get all managers (POS_MANAGER users) assigned to a POS location. Requires POS_READ capability.
Assign a POS_MANAGER user to a POS location. Requires POS_UPDATE capability.
Remove a manager from a POS location. Requires POS_UPDATE capability.

item.name: 04. Clients Management
item.description: Client management endpoints - Create, read, update, activate, suspend, terminate clients. Manage connection types and static IP assignments.

request.description: Create a new client with DYNAMIC connection type. Requires CLIENTS_CREATE capability. POS_MANAGER can only create clients for their own POS.
Create a new client with STATIC connection type. staticIpId is required and must be an available IP from the same POS.
Create a new client with PPPOE connection type. pppoeUsername and pppoePassword are required and username must be unique.
Get all clients with pagination. Requires CLIENTS_READ capability. POS_MANAGER only sees clients from their POS.
Get a specific client by ID. Requires CLIENTS_READ capability. POS_MANAGER can only access clients from their POS.

body.raw:
{
  "fullName": "John Doe Updated",
  "phone": "+1234567899",
  "email": "john.doe.updated@example.com",
  "address": "123 Main Street Updated, City, State 12345",
  "autoRenewEnabled": true
}

request.description: Update client information. Requires CLIENTS_UPDATE capability. POS_MANAGER can only update clients from their POS.
Activate a suspended client. Requires CLIENTS_ACTIVATE capability. Cannot activate terminated clients.
Suspend a client. Requires CLIENTS_SUSPEND capability. Reason must be one of: NON_PAYMENT, VIOLATION, MAINTENANCE, OTHER. reasonDetails is optional.
Terminate a client. Requires CLIENTS_TERMINATE capability. Automatically releases any assigned static IP.
Update client connection type to STATIC. Requires CLIENTS_CONNECTION_TYPE_UPDATE capability. staticIpId is required and must be available from the same POS.
Update client connection type to PPPOE. Requires CLIENTS_CONNECTION_TYPE_UPDATE capability. pppoeUsername and pppoePassword are required.
Update client connection type to DYNAMIC. Requires CLIENTS_CONNECTION_TYPE_UPDATE capability. Automatically releases static IP if assigned.
Assign a static IP to a client. Requires CLIENTS_STATIC_IP_ASSIGN capability. Client must have STATIC connection type. Static IP must be available and from the same POS.
Release static IP from a client. Requires CLIENTS_STATIC_IP_RELEASE capability. Makes the IP available for reassignment.

item.name: 05. Service Plans Management
item.description: Service plan management - Create, read, update service plans. Activate/deactivate plans. Service plans define bandwidth, cost, and duration for subscriptions.

body.raw:
{
  "planName": "Premium Plan",
  "description": "High-speed internet plan for power users",
  "serviceType": "POSTPAID",
  "durationType": "MONTHLY",
  "durationDays": 30,
  "cost": 100.00,
  "downloadSpeedMbps": 200,
  "uploadSpeedMbps": 100,
  "dataCapacityGb": 2000
}

request.description: Create a new service plan. Requires SERVICE_PLANS_CREATE capability. Plan name must be unique. Service types: POSTPAID, PREPAID. Duration types: HALF_MONTHLY, MONTHLY, QUARTERLY, HALF_ANNUAL, ANNUAL.
Create a PREPAID service plan. dataCapacityGb is typically required for prepaid plans.
Get all service plans with optional filters. Requires SERVICE_PLANS_READ capability.
Get a specific service plan by ID. Requires SERVICE_PLANS_READ capability.
Update service plan information. Requires SERVICE_PLANS_UPDATE capability. Plan name must be unique if changed.
Activate a service plan. Requires SERVICE_PLANS_UPDATE capability. Only active plans can be assigned to new subscriptions.
Deactivate a service plan. Requires SERVICE_PLANS_UPDATE capability. Deactivated plans cannot be assigned to new subscriptions.

item.name: 06. Subscriptions Management
item.description: Subscription management - Create, read, renew, upgrade, terminate subscriptions. Manage usage logs and throttling.

request.description: Create a new subscription for a client. Requires SUBSCRIPTIONS_CREATE capability. Client must be ACTIVE and not terminated. Client cannot have another active subscription. startDate is optional (defaults to now). End date is calculated from startDate + plan durationDays.
Get all subscriptions with optional filters. Requires SUBSCRIPTIONS_READ capability. POS_MANAGER only sees subscriptions from their POS clients.
Get a specific subscription by ID. Requires SUBSCRIPTIONS_READ capability.
Renew an expired or expiring subscription. Requires SUBSCRIPTIONS_RENEW capability. renewalDate is optional (defaults to current endDate).
Upgrade subscription to a higher-tier plan. Requires SUBSCRIPTIONS_UPGRADE capability. effectiveDate is optional (defaults to now). Automatically adjusts bandwidth allocation.
Terminate an active subscription. Requires SUBSCRIPTIONS_TERMINATE capability. Releases bandwidth allocation back to POS.
Create a usage log entry for a subscription. Requires USAGE_LOGS_CREATE capability. Automatically throttles subscription if data cap is exceeded. downloadMb and uploadMb are in megabytes.
Get all usage logs for a subscription. Requires USAGE_LOGS_READ capability.

item.name: 07. Invoices Management
item.description: Invoice management - Create, read, cancel invoices. Invoice status is calculated from payments (UNPAID, PAID, OVERDUE).

request.description: Create a new invoice for a client. Requires INVOICES_CREATE capability (WSP_ADMIN or SUB_ADMIN). subscriptionId is optional. Invoice number is auto-generated. Issue date must be before or equal to due date.
Get all invoices with optional filters. Requires INVOICES_READ capability. POS_MANAGER only sees invoices from their POS clients. Status is calculated from payments.
Get a specific invoice by ID with all associated payments. Requires INVOICES_READ capability. Returns calculated status based on payments.
Cancel an invoice. Requires INVOICES_CANCEL capability (WSP_ADMIN or SUB_ADMIN). Adds [CANCELLED] prefix to invoice notes. Returns invoice with calculated status.

item.name: 08. Payments Management
item.description: Payment management - Create and read payments. Payments are linked to invoices. Supports partial payments and extra amounts.

request.description: Create a payment for an invoice. Requires PAYMENTS_CREATE capability. POS_MANAGER needs explicit PAYMENTS_CREATE capability. Payment methods: CASH, BANK_TRANSFER, CARD, ONLINE. amountPaid and extraAmount must be >= 0.
Create a partial payment. Multiple payments can be made for the same invoice. Total payments (amountPaid + extraAmount) can exceed invoice amount.

body.raw:
{
  "invoiceId": "{{invoice_id}}",
  "amountPaid": 100.00,
  "extraAmount": 10.00,
  "paymentMethod": "CARD",
  "paymentReference": "CARD-11111",
  "notes": "Payment with extra amount for account credit"
}

request.description: Create a payment with extra amount. Extra amount can be used for account credit or future invoices.
Get all payments with optional filters. Requires PAYMENTS_READ capability. POS_MANAGER only sees payments for invoices from their POS clients.
Get a specific payment by ID with invoice details. Requires PAYMENTS_READ capability.

item.name: 09. Static IP Management
item.description: Static IP pool management - Create, read, update static IPs. Manage IP assignments and availability.

request.description: Create a new static IP in the pool. Requires STATIC_IP_CREATE capability. IP address must be unique. DNS servers are optional.
Get all static IPs with optional filters. Requires STATIC_IP_READ capability. POS_MANAGER only sees IPs from their POS.
Get a specific static IP by ID with client assignment details. Requires STATIC_IP_READ capability.
Update static IP configuration (subnet mask, gateway, DNS). Requires STATIC_IP_UPDATE capability. IP address cannot be changed.
Release a static IP from its current assignment. Requires STATIC_IP_UPDATE capability. Makes IP available for reassignment.

item.name: 10. PPPoE Requests Management
item.description: PPPoE change request management - Create, read, approve, reject, complete PPPoE credential change requests.

request.description: Create a PPPoE change request to update username. Requires PPPOE_REQUESTS_CREATE capability. CLIENT can only create requests for their own account. At least one of newUsername or newPassword must be provided.
Create a PPPoE change request to update password only.
Create a PPPoE change request to update both username and password.
Get all PPPoE requests with optional filters. Requires PPPOE_REQUESTS_READ capability. CLIENT only sees their own requests. POS_MANAGER only sees requests for their POS clients.
Get a specific PPPoE request by ID. Requires PPPOE_REQUESTS_READ capability.

Approve a pending PPPoE request. Requires PPPOE_REQUESTS_APPROVE capability. Automatically updates client's PPPoE credentials. Only PENDING requests can be approved. CLIENT role cannot approve requests.
Reject a pending PPPoE request. Requires PPPOE_REQUESTS_REJECT capability. rejectionReason is required. Only PENDING requests can be rejected.
Mark an approved PPPoE request as completed. Requires PPPOE_REQUESTS_APPROVE capability (WSP_ADMIN or SUB_ADMIN only). Used when physical configuration is complete.

item.name: 11. Suspension History
item.description: Suspension history management - Read suspension and reactivation records for clients.

request.description: Get all suspension history records with optional filters. Requires SUSPENSION_HISTORY_READ capability. CLIENT only sees their own suspension history. POS_MANAGER only sees history for their POS clients.
Get a specific suspension history record by ID. Requires SUSPENSION_HISTORY_READ capability.

item.name: 12. Audit Logs
item.description: Audit log management - Read system audit logs with advanced filtering options.

request.description: Get all audit logs with advanced filtering. Requires AUDIT_LOGS_READ capability. CLIENT only sees logs related to their account. POS_MANAGER only sees logs for their POS operations.
Get a specific audit log by ID. Requires AUDIT_LOGS_READ capability.

item.name: 13. Bandwidth Pool Management
item.description: Bandwidth pool management - Read and update total available bandwidth pool. Used for POS bandwidth allocation validation.

request.description: Get bandwidth pool summary including total bandwidth, allocated bandwidth, and available bandwidth. Requires BANDWIDTH_POOL_READ capability.
Update total bandwidth pool capacity. Requires BANDWIDTH_POOL_UPDATE capability (WSP_ADMIN or SUB_ADMIN). New total must be >= currently allocated bandwidth across all POS.
